pageContext.claim: “We have had such enthusiasm. Everybody wanted to go there. We went to North Carolina. We wanted to do it there. It was all set. We were going to build a beautiful facility.”
pageContext.analysis: The Charlotte Observer reported the RNC had planned to “renovate the Spectrum Center by raising the floor and building a stage and produce a four-night TV spectacle.” That is not the same as actually constructing new buildings as Trump suggests.
